RM3P01
Metroid Prime 3: Corruption

Infinite Health [brkirch]
C21C2904 00000003
3C8044BB 38846000
90830004 C0230004
60000000 00000000

Have Infinite Missiles [brkirch]
C21C0240 00000002
80A30088 90A30084
38A00001 00000000

Infinite Hypermode [brkirch]
04161BB8 4800001C
041635FC 60000000
04162F74 48000070

Infinite Health (Phaaze) [brkirch]
041620D8 60000000
041553EC 60000000
This code also disables the Phazon increase in corrupted hypermode.
